    This creates a Data Access Mockup to store the data

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static DataBaseAccessMock getInstance​()

      • addKiosk

        public Kiosk addKiosk​(java.lang.String kioskName,
                      java.lang.String locationName,
                      java.lang.String employeeName,
                      int startCapital)
        Creates a new kiosk, inits the kiosk storage, inits the employee and inits the supplier and his storage. And adds it into the kiosks
        Parameters:
        kioskName - the name of the Kiosk
        locationName - the location of the Kiosk
        employeeName - the name of the employee that works in that particular Kiosk
        startCapital - the amount of money that is in the Cash Register when the kiosk opens for the first time
        Returns:
        the kiosk that was added to the kiosks

      • getKiosks

        public java.util.Set<Kiosk> getKiosks​()

      • setKioskStorage

        public void setKioskStorage​(Kiosk myKiosk)
        Updates the kiosk storage (and "overrides" the old storage)
        Parameters:
        myKiosk - is the kiosk that was "temporally" was stored in the SceneDataHandler

      • setKioskSupplierInventory

        public void setKioskSupplierInventory​(Kiosk myKiosk)
        Updates the kiosk supplier storage (and "overrides" the old storage)
        Parameters:
        myKiosk - is the kiosk that was "temporally" was stored in the SceneDataHandler
